column4: hi, i'm having troubles installing "nvidia-glx" with apt-get, it misses the package "nvidia-kernel-1.0.9629" but i did install "linux-restricted-modules-386", anyone know how to fix this? (i'm running edgy)
hi, does anyone know how to resolve "nvidia-glx: Depends: nvidia-kernel-1.0.9629" when trying to install nvidia-glx?
and as well you shouldn't, since it doesn't exist.
